frameDefinitions: This frame covers words for Body_part(s) (BP) belonging to a Possessor (Poss), which may be characterized by a Descriptor (Desc).
A Protagonist is in the dynamic, maintained state of being alive or has exited this state.
An Agent acts in a certain Manner either generally or under some particular Circumstances.
A Protagonist needs a Means action performed for their Benefit.
This frame contains general words for Individuals, i.e. humans, whose specific acts or general behavior is evaluated against standards of morality or rightness.
A Cognizer calls up an episodic memory of past Experience or an Impression of a Salient_entity formed  on the basis of past experience.
frameExamples: He had to brace his right <t><fex name='Body_part'>arm</fex></t> against his leg in order to fight the roll.
He pledges to  <t>conduct</t> himself  with honesty and humility.
(1) I <t>rely</t> on you to see that my name is not sullied.
Columbus: Was he a Hero or a <t>Villain</t>?
Kozmo could <t>remember</t> when his modem was the fastest he could buy.
listRoleDefinitions: This Frame Element denotes the <fen>Possessor</fen> of the <fen>Body_part</fen>.
This Frame Element  is the <fen>Body_part</fen>.
<fen>Protagonist</fen> identifies the being or entity that is  dead or alive.
This role identifies the <fen>Figure</fen> or form being described by the target.
The time in which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is dead or alive.
This role marks expressions that denote the person whose conduct is being evaluated.
This role marks expressions that characterize the way that the <fen>Agent</fen> behaves.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> behaves in a certain way.
The location at which the <fen>Agent</fen> exhibits their behavior.
The person or thing whose needs are served by the <fen>Means</fen> action.
An action or state that the <fen>Means</fen> action brings about and from which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> profits.
The person or thing that performs a <fen>Means</fen> action to the <fen>Benefit</fen> of the <fen>Protagonist</fen>.
An object that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> uses to realize a <fen>Benefit</fen>.
An action or state that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> wants to bring about.  It is more or less the <fen>Benefit</fen> viewed in relation to the <fen>Protagonist</fen> rather than the <fen>Means</fen>.
An action performed either by the <fen>Protagonist</fen> or an <fen>Intermediary</fen> that has a <fen>Benefit</fen> for  the <fen>Protagonist</fen> attached to it.
The <fen>Person</fen> is the human being.
A person who recalls memories of past experience or impressions.
A person or thing that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers as being involved in some state or event or as having some property.
A past event or state that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> witnessed and is now recalling. The <fen>Experience</fen> may be a specific event or state or a vaguer period that is treated as a unit.

A property that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> attributes to the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> based on their past experience of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> or a category to which the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is assigned.
A property or role that a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> actually held and which frames the memories that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers the experience.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Kim's</fex> arm is broken.
Kim's <fex>arm</fex> is broken.
<fex>Frank</fex> was dead.
Frank's dead <fex>body</fex> was apalling.
<fex>Douglas Hurd</fex> carried himself well
They stood together and posed for the pass, Alleyne relaxed and smiling , a tall , angular man who carried himself <fex>with natural elegance</fex> .
She knew that she had behaved badly <fex>last night</fex>

Sometimes an offender may be placed at a Probation hostel because they have committed
a serious offence or have behaved badly <fex>at an independent hostel</fex>
<fex>I</fex> rely on this walking stick to get me around
He still relies on me <fex>to do the head work</fex>
We rely <fex>on you</fex> for feedback and input
I hate having to rely <fex>on my car</fex> to get where I want to go
The user will quickly begin to rely on the pills <fex>to cope with life pressures</fex>.
We rely <fex>on your response</fex>
I will truly miss Delmar and <fex>I</fex> will always remember when his eyes lit up everytime he got ice-cream.
today I saw a sister's exclassmate, and didn't recognise him, I remember <fex>him</fex> taller.
I can still remember <fex>saying the pledge every morning before class in elementary school</fex>, a rare occurrence among elementary school kids nowadays.
I remember Peter <fex>as immensely kind in those first three weeks before I was packed off to boarding school</fex>.
Atulprasad is principally remembered <fex>as a musician and composer</fex>.
I 'll <fex>never</fex> forget being in hospital

passageCandidateSpans.text: The Guardian: Word of Mouth Blog
